channel.title: A few simple questions..noobish questions
channel.description:
WOOT FIRST POST!
Well anyways im a total noob at servers.. im a week old anyways
2 questions
1. how do you make a defence bonuses work? like make them work not change them... like insteat of a monster just hitting you.... armour pretects you... like runescape the better the bonuses the less cnance you are to get hit.. so my questions how do i make the bonuses work?
2. how do i get prayer to work.. like just the pretect prayers... only pretect from magic, range and melee... i just want it so monsters hit 0s on you all the time when your useing prayer
Got any answers?
